name: places/ChIJv_suYoFYwokRfvzqXs6jowo
formattedAddress: 585 West End Ave # 1G, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 585 West End Ave # 1G, New York, NY 10024-1715, USA

originalText.text:
I have never written a review on the internet. This time I told myself I have to stand up for myself and tell the other patients what they might encounter.  Dr. Marcel’s non–ethical and non-professional behaviors are so over the top,  I need to tell others so they can avoid Dr. Marcel.

I visited Dr.Marcel on April 9th to get a prescription for my contact lenses and eye glasses. My friend used Dr. Marcel to get his prescription two years ago. I explained that I visited him because I want to have my prescription and that I just had my eyes examined a few months ago. He said that he would give me a prescription at end of the day.

He didn’t tell me what the procedures he was going to use in the visit. I assumed he would give me a regular vision test.

First, he asked questions about my work and where I live, and performed a vision check and asked me to try a pair of contact lenses. After that, I waited outside his office for 20 mins. He then called me back to his office and checked my vision again with the new contact lenses. After this, he asked me to take out my contacts and gave me two drops without explaining what they were for.  I guess it was a pupil dilation test. He asked me to visit his office in one week to have a follow up about my contact lenses.

On the second visit, the receptionist first performed a weird test that no one explained what it is. I then see Dr Marcel. He asked me how I feel about the contact lenses? I told him that left eye was not the correct lens and it needs change. He re-checked my eye vision and gave me a new pair of contact lenses. He then gave me the prescription without making another appointment to follow up for the new contact lenses. Before my third appointment, I got my $450 bill for the irrelevant eye exams for my vision prescription and with a wrong prescription

originalText.text: A very caring doctor who went out of his way to accommodate my elderly neighbor.

text.text: A very caring doctor who went out of his way to accommodate my elderly neighbor.

originalText.text: Couldn't ask for a more caring or responsive specialist.

text.text: Couldn't ask for a more caring or responsive specialist.
